skpm.utils.validation.validate_methods_from_class(features: str | list[str], class_obj: Any) → list[tuple[str, callable]][source]

Validate methods from a class.

Parameters:

  • features (Union[str, list[str]]) – features to be extracted from a class.

  • class_obj (Any) – a class object cotaining class methods.

Returns:

a list of tuples

containing the name of the feature and the method.

Return type:

list[tuple[str, callable]]

skpm.utils.validation.validate_columns(input_columns: Iterable, required: list) → list[source]

Validate required columns.

This method checks if the input columns contain the required columns.

Parameters:

  • input_columns (Iterable) – Input columns.

  • required (list) – Required columns.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the input is missing any

  • of the required columns. –

Returns:

the input columns

Return type:

list
